label: Subatomic Physics
description: The nature and properties of nuclei and elementary particles, symmetries, interactions, nuclear models, tools and techniques of experimental subatomic physics, and applications to power generation, astrophysics, chemistry, medicine, and biology. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: PHYS 485 or PHYS 486.
courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: PHYS 485 or PHYS 486.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to students with Junior or Senior class standing.
